metadata.synopsis: The reward the player for killing the beastmaster and then leave after the dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically after the beastmaster is killed in the Dock Warehouse after the waveservants confrontation.

0.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
0.text: The Abomination is dead. We thank you for your help.

2.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
2.text: The Wavemother rewards those who submit to her will.

1.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
1.text: Now - our harbour is filthy with black blood. It clings to life like death. Waveservants - away.
